# AudioDriverKit | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AudioDriverKit ](/documentation/audiodriverkit)

Namespace# AudioDriverKit

DriverKit 21.0+

```
namespace AudioDriverKit;
```

## [Topics](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit#topics)

### [Structures](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit#Structures)

[`IOUserAudioCustomPropertyInfo`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiocustompropertyinfo)A description of a custom property’s data types.[`IOUserAudioObjectPropertyAddress`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioobjectpropertyaddress)An object that collects the three parts — selector, scope, and element — that identify a specific property.[`IOUserAudioStreamBasicDescription`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiostreambasicdescription)A structure that encapsulates all of the information for describing the basic format properties of a stream of audio data.### [Variables](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit#Variables)

[`IOUserAudioIOOperationBeginRead`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioiooperationbeginread)[`IOUserAudioIOOperationWriteEnd`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioiooperationwriteend)[`IOUserAudioObjectPropertyElementMain`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioobjectpropertyelementmain)The identifier for an audio object’s main element.[`kIOUserAudioObjectIDDriver`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/kiouseraudioobjectiddriver)The audio object ID of the driver.### [Type Aliases](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit#Type-Aliases)

[`IOOperationHandler`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iooperationhandler)[`IOUserAudioIOOperation`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioiooperation)[`IOUserAudioObjectID`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioobjectid)An identifier that provides a handle on a specific audio object.[`IOUserAudioObjectPropertyElement`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioobjectpropertyelement)A four character code which, along with the selector and scope, identify a specific piece of information about an audio object.[`IOUserAudioObjectPropertySelector`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioobjectpropertyselector)A four character code which, along with the scope and element, specific piece of information about an audio object.### [Enumerations](/documentation/AudioDriverKit/AudioDriverKit#Enumerations)

[`IOUserAudioChannelLabel`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiochannellabel)Constants to set the preferred channel layout on an audio device.[`IOUserAudioClassID`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioclassid)An identifier for the type of audio object.[`IOUserAudioClockAlgorithm`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioclockalgorithm)Values that describe clock-smoothing algorithms.[`IOUserAudioCustomPropertyDataType`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiocustompropertydatatype)A data and qualifier type used for custom properties.[`IOUserAudioDeviceTransportState`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiodevicetransportstate)[`IOUserAudioFormatFlags`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioformatflags)Flag values that provide more information about the format used by an audio stream basic description.[`IOUserAudioFormatID`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioformatid)An enumeration of four character codes used to identify distinct audio data formats.[`IOUserAudioObjectPropertyScope`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioobjectpropertyscope)A four character code which, along with the selector and element, identify a specific piece of information about an audio object.[`IOUserAudioReservedConfigChangeAction`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudioreservedconfigchangeaction)Identifiers for object state changes that require a configuration change.[`IOUserAudioStartStopFlags`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiostartstopflags)Values that indicate I/O starts or stops.[`IOUserAudioStreamDirection`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiostreamdirection)A type representing the direction of audio flow.[`IOUserAudioStreamTerminalType`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiostreamterminaltype)Constants that describe the terminal type of an audio stream.[`IOUserAudioTransportType`](/documentation/audiodriverkit/audiodriverkit/iouseraudiotransporttype)The type of transport to deliver audio.
